description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer extension and installation of 3no roof lights to front roof slope
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that Condition 8 (Architectural Detailing) of Planning Permission 20/02235/CREG3 are hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

Please provide copies of all existing and proposed elevations at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing all elevations not just part and indicating all key dimensions for the proposed work.Please show the position of bay windows to be replaced in the elevations.
